meanings.definition: A list of goods or services provided with a statement of the sum due.
meanings.sent1: The company kept all the invoices in a neat file for easy reference.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure to include all the invoices when submitting your expenses.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the invoices were a great place to take a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a chaotic stack of invoices, each demanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The invoices fluttered in the wind, reminding him of all the work he had done.

meanings.definition: To send an invoice for goods or services provided.
meanings.sent1: He invoices his clients promptly after completing a project.
meanings.sent2: Remember to invoice the customer as soon as the job is done.
meanings.sent3: The robot joked that it could also invoice for its mechanical services.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a well-crafted invoice, clear and professional.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the printer filled the room as it diligently printed out the invoices.
